TITLE: Gluten Free Restuarant Staff
LINE1: Au i ka maʻi i kapaia o Celiac maʻi a me ka i, e hahai i ka ikaika gluten noaʻai.
LINE2: Au no ia mea, e lilo loaʻino ina au e ai i ka ai i loaʻa ka flours a mānoanoa o ka palaoa, rai, bale a me ka ota.
LINE3: No anei keia ai no ka palaoa a me ka mānoanoa o ka palaoa, rai, bale a ota? Inā 'oe e ma nā mea a pau e pili ana i maopopo mea i ka ai kekahi, e hai mai iaʻu.
LINE4: Au e ai i ka ai i loaʻa ka raiki, maize, ka uala, a pau keia ano o ka lau a me ka hua, he hua paha, me ka waiū, ka waiu, ka ai a me ka iʻa - like loa me ka mea, i ole moʻa me ka palaoa palaoa, kuʻi, breadcrumbs a meaʻai kākele.
